attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring back National Service for 18-24 year olds for all men and women.  If leaving school under the age of 18, then enlistment to the National Service is automatic.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions on this issue.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=national+service
Please consider signing one of those, rather than creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
